Text: Wrong category. Should be in TV Shows High Def.

Lately, the new episodes that are uploaded in 720p for this show, don't work very well. The audio doesn't work well when they speak when I stream through my PS3, and when I play normally with VLC on my PC the video lags often. Any suggestions?
I noticed this as well in many recent HDTV episodes from various shows (audio gaps on PS3). Maybe a change in codec (algorithm, another version, different settings). I can't tell why this happens.
I just convert them into mp4 using ps video 9.That makes the filesize smaller and fixes the lag problem.Hope that helps.
If you use PS3MediaServer for streaming try to change the "Number of audio channels" to 2. Seems to fix the problem with audio gaps. Not a perfect solution, but 5.1 is not so important in this case.
